author: Tegan Taylor
title: The coronavirus has been translated into music, and it's surprisingly beautiful
description: Scientists have translated the characteristic spikes of the new coronavirus into a musical score. It's surprisingly soothing, and could play a role in helping us understand the virus better or even develop drugs to fight it.
content:
By this stage, you will have seen plenty of artists' impressions of the new coronavirus, SARS-CoV-2. Now, you can hear one. 
One of the distinguishing features of SARS-CoV-2 is the crown, or corona, of spikes on its surface. Zoom in to those infinitesimal sp… [+2998 chars]
